lines: Komvwa zilimba a majwi, Zilumbaizya Mwami,
Kujulu kuli kuseka, Jesu Mwami wa luse langa ukede
Mwami wesu wabulemu, Kukabe kutamani basalidwe,
Bonse bakwe baya kukomanisya, Kukomana anguwe,
Mwami kofwamba kusika, Leta buzuba bwako ibubotu,
Twatelela julÕanyika zyamana Atulumbu tuya kwimba,
Bulemu ku Mwami wesu, Aleluya, Aleluya, Aleluya.
